member.name: M:Unigine.Visualizer.setEnabled(bool)
member.summary: Enables or disables the visualizer.
member.param: true to enable the visualizer, false to disable it.

member.name: M:Unigine.Visualizer.isEnabled
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the visualizer is enabled.
member.returns: 1 if the visualizer is enabled; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.Visualizer.setSize(int)
member.summary: Updates the current size of the handler. All handlers have the same size.
member.param: A new handler size in pixels.

member.name: M:Unigine.Visualizer.getSize
member.summary: Returns the handler size. All handlers have the same size.
member.returns: The current size of the handler in pixels.

member.name: M:Unigine.Visualizer.setTextureName(char)
member.summary: Updates the current name of the texture.
member.param: A new name of the texture.

member.name: M:Unigine.Visualizer.getTextureName
member.summary: Returns the string with the name of the texture.

member.name: M:Unigine.Visualizer.clear
member.summary: Clears all internal primitives created by calls to renderSmth functions. These primitives are accumulated in the internal buffer and then rendered together. This method can be used to render several viewports with visualizer.

member.name: M:Unigine.Visualizer.renderPoint2D(Unigine.Math.vec2,float,Unigine.Math.vec4,float,float) const
member.summary: Renders a 2D point of a given size and color. 2D points are rendered in the screen plane; coordinates of the upper left corner are (0; 0), of the lower right corner—(1; 1).
member.param: Point coordinates.
Point size in range [0;1]. The point size is set in proportion to the screen resolution.
Point color.
Z-order value for the rendered element. An element having a lower order shall be rendered over the one having a higher one.
Time period (in seconds) during which the rendered element shall be displayed. The default value of 0 means that the visualizer is rendered for 1 frame only.

member.name: M:Unigine.Visualizer.renderPoint3D(Unigine.Math.Vec3,float,Unigine.Math.vec4,bool,float,bool) const
member.summary: Renders a 3D point of a given size and color. 3D points are rendered in the world space.
member.param: Point coordinates.
Point size in range [0;1]. The point size is set in proportion to the screen resolution.
Point color.
Flag indicating the type of dimensions to be used:false - use the world space dimensionstrue - use the screen space dimensions
Time period (in seconds) during which the rendered element shall be displayed. The default value of 0 means that the visualizer is rendered for 1 frame only.
true to enable depth testing for the element (if it should be obscured by elements closer to the camera); false — to disable it.

member.name: M:Unigine.Visualizer.renderLine2D(Unigine.Math.vec2,Unigine.Math.vec2,Unigine.Math.vec4,float,float)
member.summary: Renders a 2D line of a given color. 2D lines are rendered in the screen plane; coordinates of the upper left corner are (0; 0), of the lower right corner — (1; 1).
member.param: Starting point of the line.
Ending point of the line.
Line color.
Z-order value for the rendered element. An element having a lower order shall be rendered over the one having a higher one.
Time period (in seconds) during which the rendered element shall be displayed. The default value of 0 means that the visualizer is rendered for 1 frame only.

member.name: M:Unigine.Visualizer.renderLine3D(Unigine.Math.Vec3,Unigine.Math.Vec3,Unigine.Math.vec4,float,bool)
member.summary: Renders a 3D line of a given color. 3D lines are rendered in the world space.
member.param: Starting point of the line.
Ending point of the line.
Line color.
Time period (in seconds) during which the rendered element shall be displayed. The default value of 0 means that the visualizer is rendered for 1 frame only.
true to enable depth testing for the element (if it should be obscured by elements closer to the camera); false — to disable it.

member.name: M:Unigine.Visualizer.renderLine2D(Unigine.Math.vec2,Unigine.Math.vec2,Unigine.Math.vec2,Unigine.Math.vec4,float,float)
member.summary: Renders a 2D line of a given color by using 3 points. 2D lines are rendered in the screen plane; coordinates of the upper left corner are (0; 0), of the lower right corner — (1; 1).
member.param: Coordinates of the starting point of the line.
Coordinates of the intermediate point of the line.
Coordinates of the ending point of the line.
Line color.
Z-order value for the rendered element. An element having a lower order shall be rendered over the one having a higher one.
Time period (in seconds) during which the rendered element shall be displayed. The default value of 0 means that the visualizer is rendered for 1 frame only.

member.param: Coordinates of the starting point of the line.
Coordinates of the intermediate point of the line.
Coordinates of the ending point of the line.
Line color.
Time period (in seconds) during which the rendered element shall be displayed. The default value of 0 means that the visualizer is rendered for 1 frame only.
true to enable depth testing for the element (if it should be obscured by elements closer to the camera); false — to disable it.

Coordinates of the ending point of the line.
Color, in which the line will be rendered.
Z-order value for the rendered element. An element having a lower order shall be rendered over the one having a higher one.
Time period (in seconds) during which the rendered element shall be displayed. The default value of 0 means that the visualizer is rendered for 1 frame only.

Coordinates of the third vertex.
Triangle color.

Coordinates of the third vertex.
Coordinates of the fourth vertex.
Color, in which the quad will be rendered.

member.param: Object smart pointer.
Color in which the object will be rendered.

member.name: M:Unigine.Visualizer.renderSolidObjectSurface(Unigine.Ptr{Unigine.Object},int,Unigine.Math.vec4,float) const

member.param: Object smart pointer.

member.name: M:Unigine.Visualizer.renderMessage2D(Unigine.Math.vec3,Unigine.Math.vec3,char,Unigine.Math.vec4,int,int,float)
member.summary: Renders a message in a given color. Message position is specified in screen coordinates.
member.param: Coordinates of the anchor point of the message, each in [0;1] range.

Message alignment. The first two values in the vector set the offset, the third one is ignored. For example, vec3(-1,-1,0) sets the offset of the center of the message to its upper left edge. vec3(1,1,0) - to the lower right corner.
Message text to display.
Color, in which the message will be rendered.
1 to use font outlining, 0 not to use.
Font size.
Time period (in seconds) during which the rendered element shall be displayed. The default value of 0 means that the visualizer is rendered for 1 frame only.

member.name: M:Unigine.Visualizer.renderMessage3D(Unigine.Math.Vec3,Unigine.Math.vec3,char,Unigine.Math.vec4,int,int,float)
member.summary: Renders a message in a given color. Message position is specified in world coordinates.
member.param: Coordinates of the anchor point of the message (in world coordinates).

Message alignment. The first two values in the vector set the offset, the third one is ignored. For example, vec3(-1,-1,0) sets the offset of the center of the message to its upper left edge. vec3(1,1,0) - to the lower right corner.
Message text to display.
Color, in which the message will be rendered.
1 to use font outlining, 0 not to use.
Font size.
Time period (in seconds) during which the rendered element shall be displayed. The default value of 0 means that the visualizer is rendered for 1 frame only.

member.name: M:Unigine.Visualizer.setMode(Visualizer::MODE)
member.summary: Sets a new Visualizer mode to be used. You can choose to display Visualizer with or without depth testing, or turn it off completely.
member.param: New Visualizer mode to be set.

member.name: M:Unigine.Visualizer.getMode
member.summary: Returns the current Visualizer mode.

member.name: F:Unigine.Visualizer.MODE_ENABLED_DEPTH_TEST_DISABLED
member.summary: Display the Visualizer without depth testing.

member.name: F:Unigine.Visualizer.MODE_ENABLED_DEPTH_TEST_ENABLED
member.summary: Display the Visualizer with depth testing enabled.

member.name: F:Unigine.Visualizer.MODE_DISABLED
member.summary: Do not display the Visualizer at all.
